pageSetting.title: 职能部室员工考核结果评价查询

attribute.value: select dmz as key,dmms as value from CSB_DMMS where dmmc ='KHZQ'
select dmz as key,dmms as value from CSB_DMMS where dmmc ='KHZQ' and 1=2
select fabh as key, famc as value from znbs_fapz where khnf=$khnd$ and khzq=$khzq$ and 'test'<>'test$khzq$'

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select fapz.khnf, case when fapz.khzq=1 then '月' when fapz.khzq=2 then '季' else '年' end as khzq, case when fapz.khzq=1 then cast(zxpffa.khqs as char(8))|| '月' when fapz.khzq=2 then '第'||cast(zxpffa.khqs as char(8) )|| '季度' else cast(zxpffa.khqs as char(8))|| '年' end as khqs, fapz.famc, khjg.jgdh, khjg.jgmc, hygw.gwmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc , zxpffa.py, zxpffa.fabh, zxpffa.khdxdh ,fapz.khzq khzq1, zxpffa.khqs khqs1,hygw.gwbh,zxpffa.pjr from znbs_zxpffa zxpffa inner join khdx_hygw hygw on zxpffa.khdxdh=hygw.khdxdh and zxpffa.khqm between hygw.qsrq and hygw.jsrq inner join znbs_fapz fapz on zxpffa.fabh=fapz.fabh inner join khdx_jg khjg on zxpffa.khdxdh=khjg.khdxdh inner join khdx_hy hy on zxpffa.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh where 1=1 and fapz.khnf=$khnd$ and fapz.khzq=$khzq$ and zxpffa.khqs=$khqs$ and fapz.fabh =$famc$ and zxpffa.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and zxpffa.khdx='2' and hygw.gwbh='$gwmc$'

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select fapz.khnf, case when fapz.khzq=1 then '月' when fapz.khzq=2 then '季' else '年' end as khzq, case when fapz.khzq=1 then cast(zxpffa.khqs as char(8))|| '月' when fapz.khzq=2 then '第'||cast(zxpffa.khqs as char(8) )|| '季度' else cast(zxpffa.khqs as char(8))|| '年' end as khqs, fapz.famc, khjg.jgdh, khjg.jgmc, hygw.gwmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc , zxpffa.py, zxpffa.fabh, zxpffa.khdxdh ,fapz.khzq khzq1, zxpffa.khqs khqs1,hygw.gwbh,zxpffa.pjr from znbs_zxpffa zxpffa inner join khdx_hygw hygw on zxpffa.khdxdh=hygw.khdxdh and zxpffa.khqm between hygw.qsrq and hygw.jsrq inner join znbs_fapz fapz on zxpffa.fabh=fapz.fabh inner join khdx_jg khjg on zxpffa.khdxdh=khjg.khdxdh inner join khdx_hy hy on zxpffa.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh where 1=1 and fapz.khnf=$khnd$ and fapz.khzq=$khzq$ and zxpffa.khqs=$khqs$ and fapz.fabh =$famc$ and zxpffa.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and zxpffa.khdx='2' and hygw.gwbh='$gwmc$' ) t
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select dmz as key,dmms as value from CSB_DMMS where dmmc ='KHZQ'
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select dmz as key,dmms as value from CSB_DMMS where dmmc ='KHZQ' and 1=2
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select fabh as key, famc as value from znbs_fapz where khnf=$khnd$ and khzq=$khzq$ and 'test'<>'test$khzq$'
